author: Ernst
title: Very nice ANWB road-service set
review:
A very lovely set to build, to own and to play with. I bought it in the first place to divide sending costs but am now more than happy I did because it is such a nice set with a lot of possibilities.

 

Building is great fun, like all old sets all small parts and with a great result. You finally have 3 cars including a towingtruck, a service-shop and an alarmphone.

 

Parts are just great!! The shop and servicecar have all kinds of small tools, the shop has also a tyre repair machine. The towingtruck has 2 functioning ramps and a good towing device, the same you find on the castles. The broke-down car has a hood you can open, nice thinking here. The set includes 3 nice mini-figures which is sufficient. It would have been 5 bricks here too if it was completed with a road groundplate, really the only thing I miss.

 

Reading my review you can only conclude playability is great, a well deserved 5 bricks here too.

 

Value for money is ok for me too, Bricklink offers an average value of â‚¬33,50. I think it is definitly worth it, esspecailly for Dutch collectors, and I paid even less.
